attributes.action: better supervise local politicians and councillors in their local election campaigns - monitor propoganda materials, some of which is defamatory
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Some of the libellous materials pushed through my door in the current election campaign are clearly party political and non - factual - please legislate to hold campaigners to account. There is no place in a parliamentary democracy for the ridicule of public figures, humiliation of others, ruination of professional careers and publication of defamatory comments - is this rubbish what my poll tax is funding ?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
